dmx.Fixture.updateChannel: Update value of a fixture channel
dmx.RGBFixture.setBrightness: Set brightness of an RGB fixture
dmx.RGBFixture.setColor: Set color of an RGB fixture
dmx.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
dmx.createRGBFixture: Create a new RGB light fixture
dmx.createRGBFixture|param|fixtureType: of the RGB light, eg: RGBFixtureType.Baisun8ch
dmx.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
dmx.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
dmx.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
dmx.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
